bodymedia.name: BodyMedia
bodymedia.desc: Indexes the steps, calories, and sleep from an armband.

dwolla.name: Dwolla
dwolla.desc: Only provides authentication with and the basic profile for any Dwolla account.

facebook.name: Facebook
facebook.desc: Syncs data for photos, wall, news feed, and friends.

fitbit.name: Fitbit
fitbit.desc: Syncs devices, activity, sleep and weight/bodyfat

foursquare.name: foursquare
foursquare.desc: Syncs checkins, photos, and friends checkins

gcal.name: Google Calendar
gcal.desc: Access to Google Calendar, sync's the calendar list

gcontacts.name: Google Contacts
gcontacts.desc: Syncs contacts from any Google account

synclets.name: self
synclets.note: frequency has to be < 30min to keep access token alive for media fetches for now, see map.js TODO

gdocs.name: Google Documents
gdocs.desc: Access to Google Docs, sync's the change feed

github.name: GitHub
github.desc: Syncs friends, followers, issues, repo summary, received and generated events

google.name: Google Account
google.desc: Only provides authentication with and the basic profile for any Google account.

instagram.name: Instagram
instagram.desc: Syncs photos, photo feed, and friends.

linkedin.name: LinkedIn
linkedin.desc: Syncs connections, shares, and the network updates news feed.

runkeeper.name: RunKeeper Health Graph
runkeeper.desc: Connect to RunKeeper activities and devices

smugmug.name: SmugMug
smugmug.desc: Provides authentication, proxy, photos and albums for SmugMug accounts.

stocktwits.name: StockTwits
stocktwits.desc: Connect to and authenticate with any StockTwits profile

tout.name: Tout
tout.desc: Syncs the user's profile and videos.

tumblr.name: Tumblr
tumblr.desc: Syncs blogs followed, dashboard, and all posts.

twitter.name: Twitter
twitter.desc: Syncs tweets, mentions, timeline, friends, and followers (up to 1k of them).

wordpress.name: WordPress.com
wordpress.desc: Connect to your activity and blogs on WordPress.com

yahoo.name: Yahoo Account
yahoo.desc: Provides authentication, proxy and the basic profile for any Yahoo account.

youtube.name: YouTube
youtube.desc: Basic authentication to any YouTube user

zeo.name: zeo
zeo.desc: Syncs and archives average zqscore and historic sleep stats
